alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Southwest Utah; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 3:40AM MST until January 20 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Western Millard and Juab Counties and Eastern Juab/Millard Counties, and southwest Utah. This includes the I-15 corridor through central and southwest Utah. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected at times this morning across the area.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Southwest Utah; Western Millard and Juab Counties
